Class Cube

java.lang.Object
Cube
class Cube extends Object
The Cube class represents a single cube in the 3D Tic-Tac-Toe game grid. It contains information about its position, size, color, ownership, and visual representation.

      cubeSize - Size of the cube
      BACKGROUND_COLOR - Default background color for cubes

      Parameters:

      mouseY - Y-coordinate of the point
      Returns:
